00041 class CGILayout{
00042         protected:
00043                 typedef multimap<string, string> layoutParamsMap;
00044                 stringstream mBody;
00045     mutable stringstream res;
00046                 layoutParamsMap mParams;
00047         public:
00048                 stringstream js;
00049                 stringstream css;

00051                 CSSBuilder cssBldr;

00054         public:
00055     CGILayout();

00057     ~CGILayout();
00058                 void addParam(const string& key, const string& val);
00059                 void setParam(const string& key, const string& val);
00060     void removeParams(const string& key);
00061     void setTitle(const string& title);
00062     void setBody(const stringstream& content);
00063     void addJavaScript(const string& jsFileName);
00064     void addStyleSheet(const string& cssFileName);
00065                 void addMeta(const string& metaData);
00066         public:
00067                 virtual void layout() const;
00068         protected:
00069     void printMeta() const;
00070                 void printJs() const;

00072         public:
